newsitem.title: USA: LaBarge, Venisect tell of response to FDA.
newsitem.headline: LaBarge, Venisect tell of response to FDA.

text.p: LaBarge Inc and Venisect Inc of Little Rock, Ark., said Thursday that Venisect has provided the U.S. Food and Drug Administration with additional requested information on the Laser Lancet.
The agency sought the data to complete its review ahead of market clearance of the device which is used to perforate the skin to draw small amounts of blood for testing.
Venisect conducted additional human clinical trials to gather the information requested by the FDA.
LaBarge designs a wide range of custom electronic products. Venisect has licensed manufacturing rights for the Laser Lancet to LaBarge.
